page1._comment: size must be a multiple of 9 and the number of items cannot exceed the size

0._comment1: glow is for force enchanted glow. This is not needed if there are enchantments in the enchantments section

shopData._comment1: goTo - directs to a different inventory. buyPrice - price to buy item. sellPrice - price to sell item. IF THERE IS NONE, SET IT TO null
shopData._comment2: ^ 'back' to go back a page | This directory starts from the current shop folder and appends to it. /Shops/SHOPNAME
shopData._comment3: ^ Will change the item by the amount of this it
